name: PowerGames
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: power games
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Try your hand at making decisions that impact your career and help you gain power at work. Do you have the political skills to advance to the next level, or will you crash and burn because of costly mistakes?

The game is played by answering yes or no questions to hypothetical, but common, work situations. Good luck!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
